description: 417 degree panoramic color photograph; river at center with brightly-colored murals on levee at opposite shore; two      bridges at left and right; red paved path visible right of center and at left and right edges; two adults and two    children visible on path at left and right, flying a kite; framed
title: Fukuroi: Kite Flying by the River, from 'The Tokaido Road' series
